metadata.title: CVE-2020-8813 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: graph_realtime.php in Cacti 1.2.8 allows remote attackers to executearbitrary OS commands via shell metacharacters in a cookie, if a guest userhas the graph real-time privilege.

criterions.comment: cacti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
